title: Upgraded Floor Plans, Private Entry, Great Location, Swimming Pool
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Package Acceptance', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Laundry Facility', '-Air Conditioned', '-Private Entrance', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
